name: Farm Night Story － Hidden Objects
description:
In this beautiful and quiet farm,something strange is happening.
Every night to the farm comes a thief or robbery,who is stealing the vegetables,fruits and their personal stuff.Now
Can you help the farmers to find a thief?Your task is to explore the area and find the listed objects that can be evidence. Click the screen to point to the found objects around you!Just use hints and complete this little quest. Have fun.
